item.title: That Pytest's "keyword expression" filtering supports Python conditionals
item.description: When using Pytest’s -k filtering, you can use Python expressions to combine separate search terms.

item.title: That FreezeGun doesn't work with Pytest fixtures (unless you use `pytest-freezegun`)
item.description: Wrapping tests classes with FreezeGun’s @freezegun.freeze_time doesn’t control calls to the system clock from fixtures.

item.title: You can have class-scoped autouse pytest fixtures
item.description: If you decorate a class instance method as an autouse=True pytest fixture, then it will be automatically applied for all test methods on that class.
